summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 7, Aero Heights No. 2, being the alley between 37th Ave. Southwest and 38th Ave. Southwest from Southwest Juneau Street to Southwest Raymond Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18830 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
